name: Studdy
headline: An AI math tutor for every student
description:
At Studdy, our mission is to unlock the full potential of the next generation by providing a personalized AI tutor for every student.

Studdy Buddy is a multilingual tutor that uses AI, as well as advanced speech, text, and image recognition technology to supercharge students' ability to learn new subjects.

We believe that making self-learning as easy as possible for as many students as possible (no matter their cultural, social, or educational background) is the key to unlocking the full potential of students around the world.

We're a passionate team of AI experts, educators, and builders - if you also have a passion for transforming education we'd love to hear from you.

Shoot us a message at team@studdy.ai!
tags: industry:ai-enhanced-learning; industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:education; industry:consumer; industry:edtech; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Alex Lanzoni, Founder
founders.description: Self-taught software engineer turned startup CTO working to improve education for all.

# Anyone canlearn anything
Studdy helps you learn anything

Silver, 10/29/2023
The perfect teaching app
I love it so much. It helped me with my ADHD and I didn‚Äôt need to cheat anymore. This really helped me understand my homework and stuff because I hate homework but my teacher told me I have to do it but this app helped me so much. I love this app!
![star](https://www.studdy.ai/_next/static/media/star.a4e59869.svg)![star](https://www.studdy.ai/_next/static/media/star.a4e59869.svg)![star](https://www.studdy.ai/_next/static/media/star.a4e59869.svg)![star](https://www.studdy.ai/_next/static/media/star.a4e59869.svg)![star](https://www.studdy.ai/_next/static/media/star.a4e59869.svg)
Dogs 1o1, 11/20/2023
AMAZING!
My grades were 4 Fs and 1 D now thanks to Studdy my grades are all A+ it doesn‚Äôt just flat out give me the answer first it explains it to you then gives you the answer. It‚Äôs helping me a lot. If you struggle with any subject, you should definitely get this app. It helps a lot now.

charlie24681012, 09/11/2023
amazing get IT RN!
I am a middle school student who is expected all a‚Äôs and b‚Äôs. this app helps so much with work that i have trouble understanding. It walks you through the steps so you really understand how it works‚Ä¶i have shared this app with anyone that will listen to me talk about it for more that 5 minutes. absolutely amazing.

Shelly808s, 11/22/2024
Amazing because wow!!
The app provides anything you need based on just your grade level and will focus on the subjects you need help in the most. This app has helped me to finally understand the new unit in my chemistry class because I was seriously behind. Whoever else gets this app I hope you enjoy it the way I did!

## We make learning easy
### Solve and understand the toughest problems in minutes. Ask questions when stuck and get personalized help.
#### Enter a problem
Enter any homework problem from any class
#### Get step by step breakdown
Get the simplest step by step explanation of how to solve the problem.
#### Ask for help if stuck
If one of the steps is unclear, ask for help and get personalized help.
#### Get answers to follow up questions
Never get stuck again. Chat until you get it.
### ‚ÄúThis app is amazing, it helps me understand my calculus homework better than when my teacher explains things to me.‚Äù
Dilan, 12th Grade, New Jersey
![Dilan, 12th Grade, New Jersey](https://www.studdy.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flanding-second-quote-avatar.9a7f3b62.jpg&w=1080&q=75)

## We make learning easy
### Solve and understand the toughest problems in minutes. Ask questions when stuck and get personalized help.
#### Enter a problem
Enter any homework problem from any class
#### Get step by step breakdown
Get the simplest step by step explanation of how to solve the problem.
#### Ask for help if stuck
If one of the steps is unclear, ask for help and get personalized help.
#### Get answers to follow up questions
Never get stuck again. Chat until you get it.
### ‚ÄúThis app is amazing, it helps me understand my calculus homework better than when my teacher explains things to me.‚Äù

generated_description:
**Studdy: Transforming Education Through AI**

**Overview:**  
Launched in 2023 and part of Y Combinator Batch S23, Studdy is reshaping learning with its AI-powered multilingual math tutor. The company, based in San Francisco with a dedicated team of just four, is on a mission to democratize education by offering personalized tutoring that can cater to students from any background.

**Mission:**  
At its core, Studdy aims to "unlock the full potential of the next generation." Its vision is straightforward: make self-learning accessible and effective for everyone. The team's diverse expertise in AI and education fuels their belief that technology can break down barriers in education.

**What They Offer:**  
Studdy Buddy, the AI tutor, leverages cutting-edge speech, text, and image recognition technologies to enhance student learning experiences. Whether it's for homework help or grasping difficult concepts, the platform provides users with detailed, step-by-step explanations. The emphasis isn‚Äôt just on getting to the right answer but on understanding the process, which is crucial for true comprehension.

**The Feedback Loop:**  
Users are raving about their experiences. Testimonials showcase impressive transformations‚Äîstudents moving from failing grades to As, and discovering newfound understanding in subjects they once dreaded. For instance, one user marveled at how the app not only provided answers but also personalized explanations that improved their grasp of calculus better than traditional instruction.

**Current Stats:**  
- **Downloads:** Over 500,000  
- **User Rating:** 4.8/5 from 10+ million problems explained

**Community and Vision:**  
Studdy's ambition extends beyond just creating an app. They're inviting passionate individuals to join their journey of educational transformation. If this mission resonates with you, reach out at team@studdy.ai. 

For more insight or to get started with your very own AI tutor, check out [Studdy's website](https://www.studdy.ai/).

In a world where education often feels out of reach for many, Studdy is making important strides towards ensuring anyone can learn anything. Learning just got easier, and it's about time.
